body.p:
To his Excellency Thomas E Bramlett
Governor of the Commonwealth of Ky

Your Petitioner Martin D Hardin would most respectfully represent to your Excellency that at the April Term of the Wayne Circuit court 1861 he confessed a Judgment in favour of the Commonwealth of Ky for the Sum of Sixty dollars for Tipling and which fine your petitioner will be compeled to pay unless relieved by your Excellencys kind interposition your petitioner would would most resectfully ask your Excellency to remit said fine and relieve him from the payment of the same and as in duty bound will do so no more Monticello Ky May 27th 1865

Jno L Sallee clk
H. T. Tyreell
W. Simpson
G. K. Marcum P. J. W. C. C
William Brarrett
B. F. Fleming
Wesly Huffaker
G W Ingram
J W Dunham
W. H. Hudson.
Joshua Berry.

Wayne Cir Ct
vs
M. P. Hardin
$60,
Remitted
3d June 1865
